TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi abstract sealed beforefieldinit SystemFonts extends System.Object
public ref class SystemFonts abstract sealed

summary.span: 글꼴에 관련된 시스템 리소스를 노출하는 속성을 포함합니다.

span.span: Contains properties that expose the system resources that concern fonts.

MemberSignature.Value: Public Shared ReadOnly Property CaptionFontFamily As FontFamily
public: static property System::Windows::Media::FontFamily ^ CaptionFontFamily { System::Windows::Media::FontFamily ^ get(); };

summary.span: 최소화되지 않은 창에서 비클라이언트 영역의 캡션 글꼴 패밀리를 결정하는 메트릭을 가져옵니다.

span.span: Gets the metric that determines the font family of the caption of the nonclient area of a nonminimized window.

remarks.format: ## Remarks SPI_GETNONCLIENTMETRICS에서 메트릭을 가져옵니다.Obtain the metric from SPI_GETNONCLIENTMETRICS. 참조 [SystemParametersInfo](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/default.asp?url=/library/sysinfo/base/systemparametersinfo.asp)합니다.See [SystemParametersInfo](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/default.asp?url=/library/sysinfo/base/systemparametersinfo.asp). ## XAML 특성 사용XAML Attribute Usage <*개체 속성*= "{SystemFonts.CaptionFontFamily`}`" / ><*object property*="{ SystemFonts.CaptionFontFamily`}`"/>

MemberSignature.Value: Public Shared ReadOnly Property CaptionFontFamilyKey As ResourceKey
public: static property System::Windows::ResourceKey ^ CaptionFontFamilyKey { System::Windows::ResourceKey ^ get(); };
